info.title: F5 Distributed Cloud Services API for ves.io.schema.shape.client_side_defense
info.description: Custom handler in Client-Side Defense microservice will forward request(s) to backend API(s)

post.description: Enable Client-Side Defense feature for the tenant

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

Example: ` "Web hosting"`

Date the domain was seen the latest time (last time data was collected for the site)

locations.description:
List of location -> scripts data
 Location will returned only when risk filter is applied

riskReason.description:
List of risk reasons in a human readable form

Example: ` "['Unusual number of DNS record','Has less Https certificate related info']"`

riskScore.description:
Domain reputation score - the bigger the better

Example: ` "10"`

Human readable status description

Example: ` "Action Needed"`
status.title: Status

format: unix epoch timestamp in milliseconds

  ves.io.schema.rules.repeated.items.string.max_len: 128
  ves.io.schema.rules.repeated.max_items: 10
